content.title: Welcome To
content.description1: Galaxy Corporation is one of the leading Exporter & Trader for Agro Commodities in India. The company is exporting agro commodities to customers across the globe. We are located in Pune which is a major business hub for agro commodities. The company deals in a wide range of products such as Oil Seeds, Cereals, Spices, Fresh Vegetable, Fresh Fruits, Frozen Vegetable, Frozen Fruits, Dry Fruits, Pulses, etc.
content.description2: The core strength of the Company is its strong procurement network, storage, processing, and supply of all agricultural commodities which extends into all important producing centers across India. We have the necessary expertise and backbone to meet any scale of demand for agricultural commodities.
